mapper.select: select t.TEMPLATE_ID TemplateId, t.TEMPLATE_NAME TemplateName, c.CODE CompanyCode, c.NAME CompanyName, --t.CREATE_TIME CreatTime, CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreatTime, c.REPRESENTATIVE from HR_SALARY_TEMPLATE t left join HR_COMPANY c on t.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID where t.IS_GLOBAL !=1
